text: Hansruedi Beugger was a bobsledder from Switzerland. Beugger competed at the 1964 Winter Olympics. He was born on 15 July 1930 and died on 30 March 2020.Hansruedi Beugger == References == Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss bobsledders Category:Olympians for Switzerland
title: Hansruedi Beugger
